title: Improve grave tile hover info contrast on Map tab

requirements.text: Improve the color contrast and overall readability of the hover preview (tooltip) shown when the user hovers a grave tile on the public “Map” tab, so that the grave identification information is clearly visible in both light and dark themes.

quotes: po otworzeniu zakładki Mapa, po najechaniu kursorem na kafelek grobu niestety jest słaby kontrast i słabo widać informację który to grób - należy poprawić kontrast kolorystyczny wyświetlania podglądu informacji o wybranym grobie po najechaniu na niego kursorem.

acceptanceCriteria: On the public Map tab, the tooltip content for a hovered grave tile is clearly readable (good contrast) in both light mode and dark mode.
The tooltip’s primary line identifying the grave (e.g., “Grave no. X”) uses a high-contrast text color against the tooltip background.
Secondary tooltip text (e.g., deceased names) is still visually secondary but remains clearly legible (not washed out / low-contrast).
No backend changes are required; only UI styling/markup changes are made.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components must be composed/used, not edited).
Keep the backend architecture unchanged (single Motoko actor); no schema/state migration is needed for this UI-only change.
nonGoals: Do not change cemetery map data, layout, alley/grave ordering, or hover behavior timing.
Do not redesign the entire Map page; only address the hover preview/tooltip contrast issue.
